description: This module allows you to create, modify and delete Zabbix host entries and associated group and template data.

login_user.description: Zabbix user name, used to authenticate against the server.

interfaces.description: List of interfaces to be created for the host (see example below).

server_url.description: Url of Zabbix server, with protocol (http or https).

visible_name.description: Visible name of the host in Zabbix.

proxy.description: The name of the Zabbix Proxy to be used

host_groups.description: List of host groups the host is part of.

force.description: Overwrite the host configuration, even if already present

link_templates.description: List of templates linked to the host.

host_name.description: Name of the host in Zabbix.
